main module

class main.AppLauncher[source]

Bases: object

Class responsible for starting and managing the application.

This class handles initializing the QApplication, loading configurations, managing translations, displaying the splash screen and language selection screen, and handling global errors.

Attributes:
SETTINGS_GERAL_LANGUAGEstr

Configuration key that sets the preferred language.

SETTINGS_GERAL_DATE_MASKstr

Configuration key for date format.

DEFAULT_DATE_FORMATstr

Default date format for local language.

USA_DATE_FORMATstr

Default date format for English (US) language.

loggerLog

Logger instance to record application events.

appQApplication

Main instance of Qt application.

translatorQTranslator

Responsible for applying translations to the interface.

language_modelLanguage

Model that handles available languages and system.

splashSplashScreen or None

Splash screen displayed at startup.

main_windowTTeaApp or None

Main application window.

language_viewLanguageView or None

Language selection interface.

language_controllerLanguageController or None

Language selection controller.

settingsQSettings

Object that reads/writes persistent settings.

has_errorbool

Flag to indicate if an error occurred during execution.

Methods

get_initial_language()

Returns the initial language of the application based on the or system configuration.

load_translator(language)

Loads the translation file for the specified language.

start()

Starts the main execution of the application.

check_language()

Check whether to display the language selection screen.

show_language_selection()

Displays the language selection screen.

setup_main_window()

Initializes and displays the main application window.

on_language_selected()

Processes the language selection and saves the preference.

on_language_cancel()

Terminates the application if the language selection is canceled.

close_all_windows()

Closes all visible windows.

handle_error(exception)

Displays an error message box and terminates the application.
DEFAULT_DATE_FORMAT = '%d/%m/%Y'
SETTINGS_GERAL_DATE_MASK = 'Geral/data'
SETTINGS_GERAL_LANGUAGE = 'Geral/idioma'
USA_DATE_FORMAT = '%m/%d/%Y'
check_language()[source]

Checks for saved language settings.

Displays the language screen or goes directly to the main window.

close_all_windows()[source]

Closes all active application windows: splash screen, language selection, and main window.

get_initial_language()[source]

Determines the initial language based on saved or system settings.

Returns:
str

ISO code of the selected language.

handle_error(exception)[source]

Handles global exceptions, logs, closes windows, and displays error messages.

Parameters:
exceptionException

Object of the caught exception.

load_translator(language)[source]

Loads the translation file for the specified language, with fallback to the default language.

Parameters:
languagestr

ISO code of the language to be loaded.

on_language_cancel()[source]

Closes the application if the language selection is canceled by the user.

on_language_selected()[source]

Handles acceptance of the language selection, saves the settings, updates the date format, loads the corresponding translation, and proceeds to the window.

setup_main_window()[source]

Instantiates and displays the main application window.

Ends the splash screen if it is still visible.

show_language_selection()[source]

Displays the language selection interface, connecting the accept and reject signals, and prepares the language controller after the splash screen.

start()[source]

Starts the Qt application, displays the splash screen, and initiates language control.

In case of an error, triggers global handling.

main.main()[source]

Main function to start the application.
